item.title: New U.S. Commerce Department report endorses ‘open’ AI models
item.description:
The U.S. Commerce Department today issued a report in support of “open-weight” generative AI models like Meta’s Llama 3.1, but recommended the government develop “new capabilities” to monitor these models for potential risks. Authored by the Commerce Department’s National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA), the report said open-weight models broaden generative AI’s availability to small […]

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg predicts a future where nearly everyone is wearing AI-powered smart glasses
